casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Clifford Ray BAUCOM. No. 360P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. William Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of July 2004 by Defendant for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion denied by order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of August 2004."
